summary: This mod add ne features with the Nightingale items.
descriptionHtml:
=======Introduction=======

This mod was made to add more options for the player concerning the Nightingale items, that you can earn in the Thieve Guild's quests.
I tried and make it well-balanced, so some features have requirements.

/! I have made this mod according to my own preferences. Your are free to make your personal change with the CK, but for yourself only. (don't upload)

VERSION FRANCAISE DISPONIBLE DANS LES FICHIERS OPTIONELS. Fichier readme FR inclus.

Please report any issue. This mod is only in its first version, and I can have made a mistake.


=======What this mod do=======

- The Nightingale items are related to the "ebony smithing" perk, so they can be improved to the "legendary" level. (excepting "bonus" version, which are related to "daedric smithing")
- The Nightingale armor is now improved with ebony instead of void salts
- You can disenchant Nightingale items
- A non-enchanted version of each piece of Nightingale Armor is craftable at the forge (see the requirements below)
- Non-enchanted versions of each Nightingale weapons are craftable (each level of the leveledlist are craftable. See the requirements below)
- You can upgrade your armor/weapon at the forge to get the better version (in Bethesda's leveledlists)
- I added an upgrade above the best vanilla version of each item, only available by crafting at the forge.
- Differences between the weights of the leveled weapons have been deleted.
- There are now one or several * to show you the position of your item in the leveledlist. (Weapons : from * to ****** ; armors : from * to ****)


=======Crafting requirements=======

NB : - ALL THE REQUIRED LEVELS ARE VANILLA ONES IN THE LEVELEDLISTS (And I added one for the bonus upgrade)
- EVERY ITEM IS LOCATED IN "EBONY" CATEGORY, EXCEPTING THE BONUS UPGRADES WHICH ARE LOCATED IN "DAEDRIC" CATEGORY

* ALL : You must have completed the quest which has given you the original item.

* Armor : "Ebony smithing" perk

* Weapons :
- * : none
- ** : "Steel smithing" perk, level 19 or above
- *** : "Dwarven smithing" perk, level 27 or above
- **** : "Orcish smithing" perk, level 36 or above
- ***** : "Ebony smithing" perk, level 46 or above

* Upgrade (you'll need the previous version to upgrade. For instance, to upgrade to ***, you need the ** version) :
- Weap ** : level 19 or above, "Steel smithing" perk
- Weap *** : level 27 or above, "Dwarven smithing" perk
- Weap **** : level 36 or above, "Orcish smithing" perk
- Weap ***** : level 46 or above, "Ebony smithing" perk
- Weap ****** : level 60 or above, "Daedric smithing" perk, void salts
- Armor ** : level 19 or above, "Steel smithing" perk
- Armor *** : level 32 or above, "Orcish smithing" perk
- Armor **** : level 60 or above, "daedric smithing" perk, void salts


======Changelog======

V 1.2 :
- Fixed another recipe issue about the bonus upgrade
- Replaced the weapon bonus upgrade at the right place


V 1.1 :
- Fixed an issue which didn't allow you to improve the unenchanted set. Now available for both French and Englsih version.
